name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatOrDie: Anonymous GPT Co-Pilot with GPT-4o, Claude 3, Gemini 1.5 & More

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatOrDie: Private GPT Co-Pilot - Chat Privately with Chat-GPT4o, Claude, Gemini, Perplexity, Cohere & More Top AI Models

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chat Anonymously

The Chat or Die Chrome extension puts the power of premium AI models like Chat-GPT4o, Claude 3.5, Gemini Pro 1.5, Dolphin Uncensored and more directly at your fingertips. Chat privately and securely, with no history, memory, or training on your conversations.

Privacy first: 
Your chats remain completely private. We don't track, monitor, or use your conversations for anything.

Premium AI models: 
Engage with a variety of top-of-the-line AI models, including Chat-GPT4o, Claude 3.5, Gemini 1.5 Pro, Dolphin unrestricted and More.

Free and premium options:
Sign up for free and access to all our models, upgrade to premium plans for even more chats.

Constant evolution: 
We constantly add new and exciting AI models to explore.

Side-by-side comparison: 
Compare responses from different AI models side by side.

One-on-one chat: 
Interact with individual models for focused conversations.

Experience the freedom and power of private AI conversations. Download the Chat or Die Chrome extension today and start exploring!

AI, chat, privacy, Chat-GPT4o, Claude 3, Gemini Pro, free, premium, Chrome extension, side-by-side, one-on-one.
